sen.j: 奈良海軍航空隊（ならかいぐんこうくうたい）及びその前身組織・三重海軍航空隊奈良分遣隊（みえかいぐんこうくうたい ならぶんけんたい）は、大日本帝国海軍の部隊・教育機関の一つ。
sen.e: Nara Naval Air Corps and its predecessor, Nara Detachment of Mie Naval Air Corps, was one of the troops and educational institutions of the Imerial Japanese Navy.
Nara Naval Air Corps and its predecessor, Nara Detachment of Mie Naval Air Corps, were one of the troops and educational institutions of the Imperial Japanese Navy.
sen.cmt: wasは文法ミスです。Imerial→スペルミスです。
sen.e: Nara Naval Air Corps and its predecessor, Nara Detachment of Mie Naval Air Corps, were one of the troops and educational institutions of the Imperial Japanese Navy.

sen.j: 一挙に増加した予科練甲飛第13・14期の生徒を教育するために新設された予科練教育航空隊である。
sen.e: It was an educational air corps of the preparatory pilot training course added in order to educate the students of the 13th and 14th groups of the Ko-type of the preparatory pilot training course, which accepted a huge number of students.

It was an educational air corps of the preparatory pilot training course added in order to educate the students of the 13th and 14th groups of the Ko-type of the preparatory pilot training course, which accepted a huge number of students.

It was an educational air corps of the preparatory pilot training course added in order to educate the students of the 13th and 14th groups of the Ko-type of the preparatory pilot training course, which accepted a huge number of students.

sen.j: 天理教の教庁がある奈良県山辺郡天理市の街中に建ち並ぶ信者詰所20数箇所に分散して宿舎・練兵場を設置し、教育・訓練を施した。
sen.e: It installed dorms and drill courts for education and training at more than 20 offices of believers of the Tenri sect scattered over Tenri City, Yamabe County, Nara Prefecture, which has the headquarter of Tenri sect.

It installed dorms and drill courts for education and training at more than 20 offices of believers of the Tenri sect scattered over Tenri City, Yamabe County, Nara Prefecture, which has the headquarter of Tenri sect.

It installed dorms and drill courts for education and training at more than 20 offices of believers of the Tenri sect scattered over Tenri City, Yamabe County, Nara Prefecture, which has the headquarter of Tenri sect.

sen.j: 沿革
sen.e: History
History
History

sen.j: 海軍は航空戦力の急速な拡大を図るため、予科練12期より定数を急増した。
sen.e: The Navy increased the number of students to accept into the 12th group of the preparatory pilot training course in order to strengthen aviation power rapidly.
The Navy increased the number of students to accept into the 12th group of the preparatory pilot training course in order to strengthen aviation power rapidly.
The Navy increased the number of students to accept into the 12th group of the preparatory pilot training course in order to strengthen aviation power rapidly.

sen.j: 昭和18年に募集した甲種第13期は、前後期合わせて20000人を超えた。
sen.e: The 13th group of the Ko-type, which was recruited in 1943, exceeded 20000 students, including both the first and second halves of the group.
The 13th group of the Ko-type, which was recruited in 1943, exceeded 20000 students, including both the first and second halves of the group.
The 13th group of the Ko-type, which was recruited in 1943, exceeded 20000 students, including both the first and second halves of the group.

sen.j: 旧来の土浦海軍航空隊・三重海軍航空隊・鹿児島海軍航空隊だけでは収容が不可能であった。
sen.e: It was impossible to accommodate them only at old corps such as Tsuchiura Naval Air Corps, Mie Naval Air Corps, and Kagoshima Naval Air Corps.
It was impossible to accommodate them only at old corps such as Tsuchiura Naval Air Corps, Mie Naval Air Corps, and Kagoshima Naval Air Corps.
sen.cmt: only atの間のスペースを削除しました。
sen.e: It was impossible to accommodate them only at old corps such as Tsuchiura Naval Air Corps, Mie Naval Air Corps, and Kagoshima Naval Air Corps.

sen.j: そこで、海軍飛行場に新たな予科練航空隊を併設するとともに、海軍飛行場のない遠隔地にも、航空機の操縦や整備訓練の段階に達していない予科練生の基礎訓練場として航空隊分遣隊を設置することとした。
sen.e: Therefore, a new air corps for the preparatory pilot training course was installed at a naval airport, and also in remote areas with no naval airport a detachment air corps was installed as a place for basic training for the students of the preparatory pilot training course, who were notyet able to do the training for operation or maintenance of airplanes.

Therefore, a new air corps for the preparatory pilot training course was installed at a naval airport, and also in remote areas with no naval airport a detachment air corps was installed as a place for basic training for the students of the preparatory pilot training course, who were not yet able to do the training for operation or maintenance of airplanes.
sen.cmt: notyet able→not yet に修正し、無駄なスペースを削除しました。
sen.e: Therefore, a new air corps for the preparatory pilot training course was installed at a naval airport, and also in remote areas with no naval airport a detachment air corps was installed as a place for basic training for the students of the preparatory pilot training course, who were not yet able to do the training for operation or maintenance of airplanes.

sen.j: 奈良分遣隊を丹波市に設置したのは、信徒が居住地と教庁を定期的に行き交う特性があり、教庁周辺に多数の信者詰所を設置していることから、予科練生の収容が容易であったからである。
sen.e: Nara Detachment was installed in Tanba City, because the believers of the Tenri sect regularly went back and forth between their residences and their headquarter, so they had many offices for the believers around the headquater, making easy the accomodation of the students in the preparatory course.

Nara Detachment was installed in Tanba City, because the believers of the Tenri sect regularly went back and forth between their residences and their headquarters, so they had many offices for the believers around the headquarter, making easy the accommodation of the students in the preparatory course.
sen.cmt: 二つ目のheadquater→スペルミスです。their headquarter→正しくはtheir headquartersです。accomodation→スペルミスです。
sen.e: Nara Detachment was installed in Tanba City, because the believers of the Tenri sect regularly went back and forth between their residences and their headquarters, so they had many offices for the believers around the headquarter, making easy the accommodation of the students in the preparatory course.

sen.j: また、天理教の布教活動にも圧力がかけられ、革新委員会が自衛措置として戦争協力を推進したことから、施設の提供が容易だったことも要因に挙げられる。
sen.e: Also, other factors can be mentioned; since the activity of the Tenri sect was under pressure, the reform committee encouraged cooperation for the war as a means of self-defense, so it was easy for them to provide facilities.

In addition, other factors can be mentioned; since the activity of the Tenri sect was under pressure, the reform committee encouraged cooperation for the war as a means of self-defense, so it was easy for them to provide facilities.

In addition, other factors can be mentioned; since the activity of the Tenri sect was under pressure, the reform committee encouraged cooperation for the war as a means of self-defense, so it was easy for them to provide facilities.

sen.j: 昭和18年12月1日 奈良県山辺郡天理市の天理教宿舎を接収し、三重海軍航空隊奈良分遣隊発足。
sen.e: On December 1, 1943, a dorm of the Tenri sect in Tenri City, Yamabe County, Nara Prefecrue was seized, and Nara Detachment of Mie Naval Air Corps was inaugurated.
On December 1, 1943, a dorm of the Tenri sect in Tenri City, Yamabe County, Nara Prefecture was seized, and Nara Detachment of Mie Naval Air Corps was inaugurated.
On December 1, 1943, a dorm of the Tenri sect in Tenri City, Yamabe County, Nara Prefecture was seized, and Nara Detachment of Mie Naval Air Corps was inaugurated.

sen.j: 甲飛第13期後期入隊(三重空・土浦海軍航空隊・松山海軍航空隊で計16890名)
sen.e: The second half of the 13th group of the Ko-type of the preparatory pilot training course was enrolled (16890 students in total includin Mie Naval Air Corps, Tsuchiura Naval Air Corps, and Matsuyama Naval Air Corps)

The second half of the 13th group of the Ko-type of the preparatory pilot training course was enrolled (16890 students in total including Mie Naval Air Corps, Tsuchiura Naval Air Corps, and Matsuyama Naval Air Corps)

The second half of the 13th group of the Ko-type of the preparatory pilot training course was enrolled (16890 students in total including Mie Naval Air Corps, Tsuchiura Naval Air Corps, and Matsuyama Naval Air Corps)

sen.j: 昭和19年4月1日 甲飛第14期前期の一部入隊(20年3月卒業)
sen.e: On April 1, 1944, part of the first half of the 14th group of the Ko-type of the preparatory pilot training course was enrolled (graduated in March, 1945).
On April 1, 1944, a part of the first half of the 14th group of the Ko-type of the preparatory pilot training course was enrolled (graduated in March 1945).
sen.cmt: part of →a part of に修正しました。in March, 1945コンマ削除しました。
sen.e: On April 1, 1944, a part of the first half of the 14th group of the Ko-type of the preparatory pilot training course was enrolled (graduated in March 1945).

sen.j: 昭和19年9月1日 卒業生の飛行練習課程凍結。
sen.e: On September 1, 1944, the graduates' flying training program was frozen.
On September 1, 1944, the graduates' flying training program was frozen.
On September 1, 1944, the graduates' flying training program was frozen.

sen.j: 甲飛第14期の大型機搭乗員候補は小松海軍航空隊に転籍。
sen.e: The candidates for the flight crews of large aircrafts in the 14th group of the Ko-type course were transferred to Komatsu Naval Air Corps.
The candidates for the flight crews of large aircrafts in the 14th group of the Ko-type course were transferred to Komatsu Naval Air Corps.
The candidates for the flight crews of large aircrafts in the 14th group of the Ko-type course were transferred to Komatsu Naval Air Corps.

sen.j: 昭和19年9月15日 甲飛第15期前期の一部入隊。
sen.e: On September 15, part of the first half of the 15th group of the Ko-type of the preparatory pilot training course was enrolled.
On September 15, 1944, a part of the first half of the 15th group of the Ko-type of the preparatory pilot training course was enrolled.
sen.cmt: 昭和19年 の箇所が訳漏れです。part of →a part of に修正しました。
sen.e: On September 15, 1944, a part of the first half of the 15th group of the Ko-type of the preparatory pilot training course was enrolled.

sen.j: 昭和19年11月28日 甲飛第15期の一部、浦戸海軍航空隊・西宮海軍航空隊・宝塚海軍航空隊へ転出。
sen.e: On November 28, 1944, part of the 15th group of the Ko-type of the preparatory pilot training course was transferred to Urado Naval Air Corps, Nishinomiya Naval Air Corps, and Takarazuka Naval Air Corps.

On November 28, 1944, a part of the 15th group of the Ko-type of the preparatory pilot training course was transferred to Urado Naval Air Corps, Nishinomiya Naval Air Corps, and Takarazuka Naval Air Corps.
sen.cmt: part of →a part of に修正しました。
sen.e: On November 28, 1944, a part of the 15th group of the Ko-type of the preparatory pilot training course was transferred to Urado Naval Air Corps, Nishinomiya Naval Air Corps, and Takarazuka Naval Air Corps.

sen.j: 昭和19年12月頃 甲飛第15期前期の一部、清水海軍航空隊に転出。
sen.e: Around December, 1944, part of the first half of the 15th group of the Ko-type of the preparatory pilot training course was transferred to Shimizu Naval Air Corps.
Around December 1944, a part of the first half of the 15th group of the Ko-type of the preparatory pilot training course was transferred to Shimizu Naval Air Corps.
sen.cmt: December, 1944→コンマ削除しました。part of →a part of に修正しました。
sen.e: Around December 1944, a part of the first half of the 15th group of the Ko-type of the preparatory pilot training course was transferred to Shimizu Naval Air Corps.

sen.j: 昭和20年3月1日 独立、「奈良海軍航空隊」開隊。
sen.e: On March 1, 1945, it became independent as "Nara Naval Air Corps."
On March 1, 1945, it became independent as 'Nara Naval Air Corps'.
sen.cmt: "Nara Naval Air Corps."原文では「」なので修正しました。コンマの位置を移動しました。
sen.e: On March 1, 1945, it became independent as 'Nara Naval Air Corps'.

sen.j: 大阪警備府隷下第24連合航空隊。
sen.e: The 24th Combined Air Corps under the control of Osaka Police.
The 24th Combined Air Corps under the control of Osaka Police.
The 24th Combined Air Corps under the control of Osaka Police.

sen.j: 昭和20年4月1日 甲飛第16期入隊(最後の予科練生)。
sen.e: On April 1, 1945, the 16th group of the Ko-type of the preparatory pilot training course was enrolled (the last students for the preparatory pilot training course.)
On April 1, 1945, the 16th group of the Ko-type of the preparatory pilot training course was enrolled (the last students for the preparatory pilot training course.)
On April 1, 1945, the 16th group of the Ko-type of the preparatory pilot training course was enrolled (the last students for the preparatory pilot training course.)

sen.j: 昭和20年6月1日 予科練教育凍結。
sen.e: On June 1, 1945, the educaiton in the preparatory pilot training course was frozen.
On June 1, 1945, the education in the preparatory pilot training course was frozen.
On June 1, 1945, the education in the preparatory pilot training course was frozen.

sen.j: 昭和20年6月30日 24連空解散。
sen.e: On June 30, 1945, the 24th Combine Air Corps was dismissed.
On June 30, 1945, the 24th Combine Air Corps was dismissed.
On June 30, 1945, the 24th Combine Air Corps was dismissed.

sen.j: 大阪警備府部隊に転籍。
sen.e: Transferred to a troop of Osaka Police.
Transferred to a troop of Osaka Police.
Transferred to a troop of Osaka Police.

sen.j: 昭和20年7月15日 解隊。
sen.e: On July 15, 1945, it was dismissed.
On July 15, 1945, it was dismissed.
On July 15, 1945, it was dismissed.

sen.j: 以上のように、独立するよりも以前に活発な教育活動が行われた。
sen.e: As can be seen above, active education was conducted before the independence.
As can be seen above, active education was conducted before the independence.
As can be seen above, active education was conducted before the independence.

sen.j: 他の予科練航空隊との訓練生転属も多い。
sen.e: There were many transfers of students to other air corps of the preparatory pilot training course.
There were many transfers of students to other air corps of the preparatory pilot training course.
There were many transfers of students to other air corps of the preparatory pilot training course.

sen.j: 独立後はは本土決戦に備えた陸戦訓練や、美保海軍航空隊大和海軍航空隊と海軍乙航空隊近畿海軍航空隊が展開する柳本飛行場の整備活動に追われていた。
sen.e: After it became independent, it was busy with training for land fighting as a preparation for the homeland fighting and maintenance of Yanagimoto Airport where Yamato Naval Air Corps of Miho Naval Air Corps and Kinki Naval Air Corps of Naval Otsu Air Corps were deployed.

After it became independent, it was busy with training for land fighting as a preparation for the homeland fighting and maintenance of Yanagimoto Airport where Yamato Naval Air Corps of Miho Naval Air Corps and Kinki Naval Air Corps of Naval Otsu Air Corps were deployed.

After it became independent, it was busy with training for land fighting as a preparation for the homeland fighting and maintenance of Yanagimoto Airport where Yamato Naval Air Corps of Miho Naval Air Corps and Kinki Naval Air Corps of Naval Otsu Air Corps were deployed.

sen.j: 敗戦とともに奈良空は解散し、信者詰所は教団に返還された。
sen.e: Nara Naval Air Corps was dismissed at the end of the war, and the offices of the believers of the Tenri sect were returned to them.
Nara Naval Air Corps was dismissed at the end of the war, and the offices of the believers of the Tenri sect were returned to them.
Nara Naval Air Corps was dismissed at the end of the war, and the offices of the believers of the Tenri sect were returned to them.

sen.j: 戦時の抑圧を脱し、信教の自由を回復した天理教は、革新運動を放棄して復元に転じ、現在も有力な新興宗教として活動している。
sen.e: The Tenri sect, which was freed from the suppression during the war and restored freedom of faith, gave up its reform activity and turned to restoration, and currently is working as a powerful emerging religion.

The Tenri sect, which was freed from the suppression during the war and restored freedom of faith, gave up its reform activity and turned to restoration, and currently is working as a powerful emerging religion.

The Tenri sect, which was freed from the suppression during the war and restored freedom of faith, gave up its reform activity and turned to restoration, and currently is working as a powerful emerging religion.

sen.e: Main Models
Main Models

sen.j: 教育訓練部隊のため、航空機の配属はない。
sen.e: there wer eno airplanes because it was an education and training squadron.
There were no airplanes because it was an education and training squadron.
sen.cmt: 最初の文字を大文字に修正しました。 wer enoを正しく置き換えました。
sen.e: There were no airplanes because it was an education and training squadron.

sen.e: Successive commanders
Successive commanders

sen.j: 不詳（昭和20年3月1日-昭和20年7月15日解隊）
